page.title: 10Transport & Garages
page.content: At{Warner's Transport}there are 30 people employed,and 29 lorries.The lorries usually work in England,but they occasionally go abroad.They use computers to calculate the workers' wages.The lorries are not allowed to go over 30.5 tons in weight.The make used is Mercedes-Benz and E.R.F. Warner's Transport have 1 other depot in Cheltenham,but have none abroad.The lorries run on diesel. {Bredon Garage}was built about 1950. They have one other garage in Evesham. Between the two garages they sell about 700 cars.The salesmen work 5 days a week and the rest work 6 days a week.They have about 10 mechanics and 3 computers.They employ about 30 people altogether.They have about 50 new cars and 50 used cars in stock, and sell about 400 gallons of petrol per day.
